name: Monketpo Prototype
description:
A small prototype for MFGG Winter Fangame Jam. Inspired very loosely by the Pokemon Tabletop games I used to play.

It's entirely too hard (though that suits the jam theme). The hit rates are too low, and the animations are a bit janky. I also wanted to implement a more Final-Fantasy-Tactics-esque turn system, but it was beyond the scope of the time I had. Overall it's an interesting experiment, but a bit of a frustrating engine to use for this purpose.
